revision.text:
'''[[Luke]]''' is a masculine given name and a surname.
'''Luke''' may also refer to: *[[Gospel of Luke]]
;Fictional characters *''Luke Jackson'', eponymous character in the 1967 film ''[[Cool Hand Luke]]''. *''[[Lucky Luke]]'', a Belgian comic book series set in the American Old West *[[Luke Baker]], ''Degrassi'' *[[Luke Cage]], a comic superhero in the Marvel Universe] *[[Luke Skywalker]], the main protagonist of the ''[[Star Wars]]'' original trilogy *[[Luke the Warrior]], the father of Martin the Warrior in the ''Redwall'' book series * Luke, a [[List of The Tribe characters#Luke|fictional character]] from the TV series ''The Tribe'' (1999-2003) *Luke Fon Fabre, the main character from [[Tales of the Abyss]] *[[Luke Megurine]] - male version (pitch change) of the Vocaloid Luka Megurine * [[Luke Snyder]], a character on the long-running daytime drama ''[[As the World Turns]]'' *Luke Triton, a character in the ''[[Professor Layton]]'' video games. *[[Luke Smith (The Sarah Jane Adventures)]], a character in the [[The Sarah Jane Adventures]] ;Music *[[Luke (album)|''Luke'' (album)]], by Steve Lukather *[[Luke (Danish band)]] *[[Luke (French band)]] *[[Luke Records]], a record label *"LUKE", a song by [[Susumu Hirasawa]] from ''Glory Wars''
;Locations *[[Luke (Hadžići)]], a village in [[Sarajevo Canton]], Bosnia and Herzegovina *[[Luke (Pale)]], a village in the municipality of Pale, Bosnia and Herzegovina *[[Luke (Čajniče)]], a village in the municipality of Čajniče, Bosnia and Herzegovina *[[Luke (Ivanjica)]], a village in the municipality of Ivanjica, Serbia *[[Luke, Kriva Palanka]], a village in Macedonia *[[Luke, Maryland]], a town in the United States *[[Luke Air Force Base]], Arizona, United States *[[Luke railway station]] in Luke, Manitoba, Canada *[[Luke, Estonia]], village in Nõo Parish, Tartu County, Estonia **[[Luke Manor]]
;Computers *[[Luke (Lucene Index Toolbox)]], an index administration and inspection tool for the [[Lucene]] search engine
==See also== *[[Saint Luke (disambiguation)]] *[[Luke]] *[[Luka (disambiguation)]]
{{disambiguation|geo}}
